snippet.title: AQWorlds Throne Of Darkness Trailer - Starts 4.15.2016
snippet.description:
Trailer for Throne of Darkness! A 7 part saga about your character written by Artix. for www.AQ.com -- Starts 4.14.2016 with the first release "The Castle of Bone."

Villain design by Dage & Laken
Map & Area Design by J6 including:
* Castle of Bone
* 4th Dimensional Pyramid
* The Death Pits
* Tower of Mirrors
* ... and more. 
Cutscenes and music will be by Ghost
Coding and Animation by Reens, Arklen, and the AE Team.

This seven part saga is using an entirely new story telling style... bumping the Queen of Monsters Saga aside, it is is written in the style of the 13 Lords of Chaos, featuring all new original villains. It starts on April 14th and will open a new area on the main continent of AdventureQuest Worlds.
